thread.section_title: ProofreadingPal.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ProofreadingPal.com | proofreadingpal.com
thread.title: Tom

author: Tom
title: Tom
text: This was my first time to utilize this website since I needed additional attention to my writing work. Whey they got back to me, I was surprised with their quality of work. So thorough and understands what I wanted from proofreading. However, I was surprised with a minimum fee they require for a decent (not short) turnaround like 24 hours or even 48hours when I came back to request second work. They basically said my writing is below minimum word count and charge me 1.5x of what I was supposed to pay first place. They should state the minimum word count and extra charges clearly, so customers don't have to be surprised at the end.
